resources.string:
BREAKFAST:

 3 Whole eggs,
 3 egg whites(scrambled),
 2 cup of cooked oats with
 1 tbsp honey,
 1 banana,
 300ml milk.


SNACKS:

 1 cup berries(strawberries,blueberries,raspberries),
 2 cups low-fat cottage cheese.


LUNCH:

 2 cups cooked brown rice,
 300g cooked chicken breast,
 1 cup green vegies.


DINNER:

 200g salmon steak,
 2 cups couscous,
 2 cups spinach,
 1 tbsp balsamic dressing.


SUPPER:

 1 cup low-fat greek yoghurt,
 1 tbsp flaxseeds.

Eating quality high protein muscle meals throughout the day that are packed with muscle building nutrients is vital to getting BIG mass gain.For best results from this mass gain diet plan make sure you drink at least 2 liters of water per day.This muscle building food plan and can be adjust to fit in with your training program.

 2 poached eggs,
 2 slices multigrain toast,
 1 tbsp natural peanut butter,
 1/2 cup oasts,300ml milk.


SNACKS:

 1 cup low-fat cottage cheese


LUNCH:

 2 cups cooked brown rice,
 300g cooked chicken breast,
 1 cup green vegies.


DINNER:

 200g salmon steak,
 2 cups couscous,
 2 cups spinach,
 1 tbsp flaxseeds.


SUPPER:

 1 cup low-fat greek yoghurt,
 1 tbsp flaxseeds.

BREAKFAST:

 Muscle Mass Smoothie,
 Blend 1 cup oats,
 1 tbsp flaxseed oil,
 1 cup of milk.
 3 scoops(60g)of Vitalstrength Pro-Muscle,
 1 cup berries,
 1 banana,


SNACK:

 Chicken/turkey sandwich with lettuce,
 tomato,
 1 slice cheese,
 low-fat mayo.


LUNCH:

 1-5 cups wholemeal pasta with tomato
 based sauce,
 1-5 cups mixed vegies,
 1 slice low fat cheese.


DINNER:

 200g trim pork,
 1 cup stir fried vegies,
 1 1/2 cup brown rice,
 1 tbsp soy sauce,
 2 tbsp cashew nuts.


SUPPER:

 1 cup low-fat greek yoghurt,
 1 tbsp peanut butter,
 1 scoop whey protein.

BREAKFAST:

 3 whole eggs,

 2 slices multigrain toast,

SNACKS:

LUNCH:

 chilli to taste.


DINNER:

 2 large sweet potatoes with olive oil.


SUPPER:

 1 tsp olive oil.

 8 Weetbix with 3 scoops(60g) of
 Vitalstrength Pro-Muscle,
 mixed with 300ml milk,
 1 sliced banana and berries.


SNACKS:

 Chicken/turkey sandwich with lettuce,
 tomato,1 slice cheese,
 loe-fat mayo.


LUNCH:

 Fish or chicken(200g),
 1 large cooked sweet potato,1 cup green
 vegies.
 1 piece of fruit.


DINNER:

 2 cup wholemeal pasta,shredded
 chicken breast(200g),
 5 cherry tomatoes,
 basil,mushroom,feta.


SUPPER:

 1 cup full cream milk,
 1 tbsp peanut butter.

BREAKFAST:

 3 egg whites,
 3 whole eggs(scrambled,or omelette),
 4 slices turkey bacon,
 1 cup spinach,
 mushroom,
 2 slices wholegrain bread.


SNACK:

 1 cup low-fat greek yoghurt,

LUNCH:

 mixed green vegies or salad,1 1/2 cup
 cooked brown rice,1/2 tin (210g) 4 bean
 mix.

 1 cup sweet potato,

 cooked brown rice,1/2 tin(210g)4 bean
 mix.


SUPPER:

 Low fat cheese with raw veggies sticks.

BREAKFAST:


Muscle Mass Pancakes:1 cup Oats,
 5 Egg Whites,
 2 Whole Egg,
 1 cup cottage cheese,
 3 scoop(60g) of Vitalstrength Pro-
 Muscle Dash Cinnamon,
 2 tbsp Coconut Oil,
 1 cup Berries.


SNACKS:


100g shredded chicken with wholemeal
 tortilla.


LUNCH:


200g deli roast beef,
 2 slices of wholemeal bread,
 1 slice cheese,

 1 tbsp low-fat mayo,
 1 piece fruit.


DINNER:


1/2 roast chicken,
 5 baby potatoes,
 1 large sweet potato,with mixed vegies or
 salad.


SUPPER:


2 cups low-fat cottage cheese,
 2 tbsp shredded coconut,
 1 tbsp suger free syrup.

LeafyGreens include Kale,spinach ,collards,swiss
 chards and a few others. They have several 
 properties that make them perfect for a weight
 loss diet. green leafy vegetables are
 also valuable for persons with type 2 diabetes.
 An increase of 1 serving day of green leafy
 vegetables was associated with a 9 percent lower risk of diabetes.

Cottage cheese is drained, but not pressed,\n so some whey remains and the individual curds remain loose. The curd is usually washed to remove acidity, giving sweet-curd cheese Different styles of cottage cheese are made from milk with different fat levels and in small-curd or large-curd preparations.

Made from conventional chicken laden with hormones and antibiotics, 
 covered with gluten-containing breading and chemicals like MSG and salt,
 and fried in cheap, rancid oils, fried chicken is high in calories, fat,
 and other chemicals that can make you sick. Skip it altogether. Please,
 please just never eat fried chicken.

Where do I begin? Fat, calories, and cholesterol 
 are only part of the problem with bacon cheeseburgers, 
 which also contain HFCS (in the buns and condiments), dairy, salt, hormones,
 and antibiotics. Itâ€™s just plain nasty. Instead, 
 opt for a veggie burger or an avocado sandwich.
Fries are simply salty unhealthy fat bombs fried in the worst possible rancid oil.\n Many fast food places now offer alternatives\n to fries such as a side salad (no dressing!)

Spread-soft, salty peanut butter on bread.It gives you approximately 192 calorie
 plus it is extra high in protein.Peanut butter is served as a spread on bread, toast or crackers, and used to make sandwiches (notably the peanut butter and jelly sandwich).
 It is also used in a number of confections, such as peanut-flavoured granola bars or croissants and other pastries
. A variety of other nut butters are also sold, such as cashew butter and almond butter, produced in comparable ways.

Butter is linked with long term weight gain.Intake of butter should be in moderation,
 as regular consumption of butter is bad for your heart.Most frequently made from cows' milk,
 butter can also be manufactured from the milk of other mammals, including sheep, goats, buffalo, and yaks.
 Salt such as dairy salt, flavorings and preservatives are sometimes added to butter.
 Rendering butter produces clarified butter or ghee, which is almost entirely butterfat.

Freezer cooking is planning and preparing meals ahead of time that can be easily frozen for later use.\n It can be as simple as doubling a recipe and then eating one that day and freezing the other for later.\n Or, freezer meal cooking can take the form of swapping pre-prepared frozen meals with friends in a Freezer Club

Juice is a drink made from the extraction or pressing of the natural liquid contained in fruit and vegetables. It can also refer to liquids that are flavored with concentrate or other biological food sources, such as meat or seafood, such as clam juice.
 Juice is commonly consumed as a beverage or used as an ingredient or flavoring in foods or other beverages, as for smoothies. Juice emerged as a popular beverage choice after the development of pasteurization methods enabled its preservation without using fermentation (which is used in wine production).
 The largest fruit juice consumers are New Zealand (nearly a cup, or 8 ounces, each day) and Colombia (more than three quarters of a cup each day).
 Fruit juice consumption on average increases with country income level.

Developed By:
 AMIT JOSHI
 AJIT SAHU
 
This App very useful for health conseous persons,because they will not eat unhealthy food and do not know that what kind of food is healthy and good for health.So if they follow our diet plan then they will notice the changes in his health.In our app they will also note his/her daily diet and mantain diet plan in regular way.They also calculate his Body Mass Index(BMI).
 
If you like our app please rate us,share the app and send review to us for app.
